arts.ttl: Mbappé accepts Flick’s challenge: Real Madrid vs Barcelona warming up
arts.sum: Yet this season began with déjà vu: against Mallorca, in what was until this week his only scoreless match, he was flagged offside three times and had two goals ruled out, one by centimeters – just like in that first Clásico. Mbappé arrives fully settled in Madrid, having already scored 15 goals in 12 matches this season.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso and Real Madrid face the Pedri puzzle in the Clásico
arts.sum: Pedri has played every official match of the season so far, and until the last international break, Flick had given him barely 4% of total minutes off the pitch. A goal that sums up the complete version of Pedri Barcelona has rediscovered under Hansi Flick.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid coach Xabi Alonso responds to Lamine Yamal’s controversial comments before El Clásico
arts.sum: He once again praised Kylian Mbappé and, when asked whether Madrid is playing good football, said, “Yes, I like what I see. But when asked if a player at “80 percent” fitness could still start, he was firm: “If someone is in the squad, it’s because they’re ready to play.”

arts.ttl: Which players have scored for both Real Madrid and Barcelona in El Clásico?
arts.sum: The first to do it, Josep Samitier (1902-1972), El Mago (the Wizard), remains a Barça legend, even though he enjoyed greater success in front of goal with Madrid in El Clásico . Some of them got on the scoresheet in El Clásico for either Madrid or Barça but only four players have scored in the iconic fixture for both.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 2-1 Barcelona: El Clásico score stats and highlights
arts.sum: Goals from Kylian Mbappe and Jude Bellingham gave Real Madrid a 2-1 win over Barcelona on Sunday, giving Xabi Alonso his first El Clasico win as head coach. But minutes later they were behind again, Bellingham putting the hosts ahead with a poacher's goal on the verge on half time.

arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham Delivers Three-Word Lamine Yamal Putdown After Clasico Win
arts.sum: The Barcelona superstar came under fire after Barcelona’s defeat on Sunday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid and Barcelona Players Speak Regarding the Scuffle After the El Clasico Final Whistle
arts.sum: Real Madrid players Vinicius Jr. and Thibaut Courtois had things to say towards Lamine Yamal, but it all started with Dani Carvajal. Barcelona defender and vice-captain Ronald Araujo did not want to comment on anything said by Yamal or Real Madrid.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso Addresses Vinicius Jr’s Reaction to Substitution in Real Madrid vs Barcelona
arts.sum: Vinicius Junior wasn't shy in displaying his emotions when he was withdrawn from Real Madrid vs Barcelona.

arts.ttl: ‘I like that’ – Real Madrid star defends Lamine Yamal after Barcelona controversy
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Aurélien Tchouaméni has moved to defend Barcelona youngster Lamine Yamal, amid the ongoing controversy surrounding the attacker. Lamine has taken his place centre stage in the post-match…

arts.ttl: One Real Madrid star played through sickness vs Barcelona
arts.sum: One Real Madrid star continued to showcase his complete and absolute commitment to the cause in the club’s latest outing. The player in question? Federico Valverde. This comes amid confirmation…
